description: A representation of service capabilities available per the request.
title: serviceDetailResponse

___objectType.description: The type of the object, serviceDetailResponse.

$eref.description: Details of a Product Specification response. These details are used for Serviceability Responses.
$eref.title: productSpecResponse

___productCode.description: Code that an organization uses for a product in its internal systems that can refer to one or a set of products (e.g., EVCINTER).

___productName.description: The name a product is known by within an organization (e.g., 5Mb Business Ethernet).

___productFeatures.description: An array of Features of the Prouct Spec.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, productSpecResponse.

___productType.description: The specific type of product being detailed (e.g. ACCESS_EPL).

___id.description: Unique identifier for the Product Specification.

___productCategory.description: A high-level categorization of products such as Ethernet.

___productSpec.description: The Product Specification that matches the request.

___id.description: An unique identifier for the Service Detail.
